data.text: @UniformCarla No, it's not like that. And there are groups working hard on education and trying to get lifesaving medications like injectable Solucortef added to paramedic supplies. It's the general knowledge that just isn't there.
@EusticeTheSheep How did you discover you had this and how should they treat a crisis maybe someone will read
@EusticeTheSheep I'm so sorry. I hate this world we're in. You (and I and every other immunocompromised person) deserve better from society.
@nastystacface We live in a tiny one bedroom apartment. My husband works in an outpatient clinic at a large university hospital. I can't wear a mask at home all the time.
@TofuForBrains And my husband works in an outpatient clinic at a big university hospital. Today he had difficulty finding a safe place to eat lunch. No one seems to care.
@EusticeTheSheep I feel this deeply. And the healthcare system is even more broken than it was before
